title: Start Here
synopsis: Welcome. This is the place to begin familiarising yourself with the way you write in [[Federated Wiki]].

title: Things You Must Do
synopsis: You can wander all day in the federation, and it's easy to get sidetracked. Here we link you directly to the things you must be do/be able to do before the starting to work with others, in a nice linear style. You can still wander if you want, but if you want to do the minimum, go through this list, skip the byways, and you will be set.

title: Voz Activity
synopsis: View all activity from [[Voz Sites]] listed in the roster below:

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: [[Platform Earth]] is a [[microservice]] platform for the [[commons]]. Here we research and specify [[microservices]] that are of utility to social and cooperative enterprises
